message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1150000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a price that's sure to be beneficial for you.  I understand the product is worth $1200000 to you, so this offer provides you with a significant advantage.  If you decline, I will be selling the product to another buyer for $1000000, so this is your chance to secure it for a much better price.  Please let me know your decision.
